name: The Might of Kalimdor
tooltip:
The Might of Kalimdor

A thousand years has passed and just as it was fated, one stands before me. One who shall lead their people to a new age.

The Old God trembles, <name>. Oh yes, it fears your faith. Shatter the prophecy of C'Thun.

It knows you come, champion - and with you comes the might of Kalimdor. You have only to let me know when you are prepared and I shall grant you the Scepter of the Shifting Sands.
